body:
Hey guys, i joined avicus today an i was NOT Happy Idek Wtf the Devs did but they srsly killed Avicus for so far i could see,

Idek When everything is Fixed but for now im not having fun to play on Avicus anymore,

i was Happy when i got Unbanned,

And now im Srsly Crying like Srsly Get the Shit together and Fix avicus or get 1.6 back!


Afterall AMA!
